TopicTitle: [WIP - 0.25] Squad HD Re-texture Project - Continuous Release (July 25)

Articles.Content:
You can also select the image in PS, then hit Layer > New Layer Mask > From Transparency, then drag the mask that is created to a new layer.

Thank you so much for the tip!
Was the download updated to include the engine fairings or not? Just wondering as it's been a few weeks since the last update.
Nope, not yet (I suddenly took a swing with Aerojet Kerbodyne and I'm releasing an update there first before getting back)
Tanks! Tanks! Tanks need retexturing! The Saturn-style of the ARM update fits with this KW style, yet none of the stock 2.5m tanks do.
Any chance you will be re texturing all stock pods/tanks too? I love all your re-texturing projects.
I will cover what I will do eventually I am quite inconsistent at the moment but every stock part is possible

I will cover what I will do eventually I am quite inconsistent at the moment but every stock part is possible

Awesome . I'll be happy for anything. At any time .
I Second That!!

You all probably know already but with 0.25 Squad has renamed a lot of part folders which breaks this. Once you move everything around it seems to be working correctly again.

How did you edit the textures for the Skipper engine? All I get when I convert it to PNG is a really tranparent diffuse file.

How did you edit the textures for the Skipper engine? All I get when I convert it to PNG is a really tranparent diffuse file.

You shouldn't have to convert anything from this pack.

EDIT- There is just MBM files all but the tanks, I just copyed them out of a 24.2 and put them in .25 where they go and all good.

How did you edit the textures for the Skipper engine? All I get when I convert it to PNG is a really tranparent diffuse file.

There is a tutorial about this a few pages back or one.

All credit to blackheart612 for the great job done, And if anyone wants to try on .25 here is a link it is missing the decoupler they keep showing up in white and on the RCS Tank there is a folder with PNG format if they don't work.

I linked your post on OP now. Thanks
Many thanx for the update.

I'd love to see this worked on some more, the work you have here is too good not to. One thing I'd love to see is a better retexture of the engine fairings and decouplers. That's the only thing that happens when you use this mod; the fairings and decoupler just don't blend with the improved textures. Hopefully you'll be able to get to them, if not, oh well, but I do think it's worth looking into .

As usual, keep up the good work!
There are also a couple mods that do just like this, have you checked them?

There are also a couple mods that do just like this, have you checked them?

None that, as far as I'm aware, change the fairing... or if they do, it's so subtle as to not be noticeable.

If you use Photoshop, make sure to get SuperPNG, and when you load the PNG, hold down ALT when you click open. Then choose "alpha" not "layer transparency", and "Set Default." That will make your life easier. PS does *not* handle PNG well out of the box.
You can also select the image in PS, then hit Layer > New Layer Mask > From Transparency, then drag the mask that is created to a new layer.

http://i.imgur.com/8ypXm37.jpg

Whoa! smart / cool

These are incredible. It's tempting me to add Squads engine back into the game just to use these.

EDIT: Just installed it. Never going back.
